title: When will the traffic light camera\'s in Wilmington be removed?
text:
The red-light camera ban working its way through the General Assembly
got stuck in a committee and never became law. Here's a link where
you can track the progress of that bill:
http://www.ncga.state.nc.us/gascripts/BillLookUp/BillLookUp.pl?Session=2011&BillID=SB+187&submitButton=Go
